#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
long long int last_digi(long long int temp, long long int num) {
	long long int final1 = 0;
	if(temp < 0)
		temp = 1;
	for(long long int i = temp; i < num; i++ ) {
		long long int k = i;
		long long int ans = 0;
		while(k!=0) {
			if((k%10)%2==0) {
				ans += 2*(k%10);
			} else {
				ans += k%10;
			}
			k = k/10;
		}
		final1 += ans%10;
	}
	return final1;
}
int main() {
	int n;
	long long int num1, num2, temp1, temp2;
	cin >> n;
	while(n--) {
		long long int ans = 0;
		cin >> num1 >> num2;
		temp1 = num1;
		temp2 = num2;
		if(num2-num1 > 10) {
			num1 = num1/10 - 1;
			num2 = num2/10 + 1;
			if(num1 < 0)
				num1 = 0;
			long long int diff = num2 - num1;
			ans = 9*5*diff;
			ans -= last_digi(num1*10, temp1);
			ans -= last_digi(temp2 + 1, num2*10);
		} else {
			ans = last_digi(num1, num2+1);
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
